column5: I'm interested, but I think you and I are on an island here as far as this goes lol
It got over 100 views and it's the most hockey they might have this year....greedy billionaires and millionaires...

"The statue was based on a photo taken by Courier-Express photographer Ron Moscati during a 1975 playoff game against Montreal."  Courier Express lol.....WOW I havent heard that since i was a kid helping my brother do "inserts" before he went out to deliver papers.
I use to deliver the Courier Express every morning on my bike....then head off to fish in the summer....once I delivered it at 4am and someone called the police on me....

THe paper route was a staple "first job" when i was a kid.......A pleasure in the warm months but a nightmare some mornings during the Buffalo winters. And collecting.......UGH, thats where the real frustration set in

Collecting and delivering the Sunday paper was the worst....my friend that I got the job from would take out people porch light bulbs and smash them on their driveways if they didn't pay him after 2 weeks in a row...LOL..
